underlying_goal: To design a new skill for Claude Code to delegate tasks to the Codex CLI.
friction_detail: Initial API call failed with an authentication error, requiring a /login command.
primary_success: Claude effectively used the brainstorming skill to guide the user through a structured design process, asking targeted multiple-choice questions to quickly converge on a detailed specification for the new 'codex-delegate' skill.
brief_summary: The user proposed creating a skill for Claude to delegate tasks to the Codex CLI. Claude initiated a brainstorming session, asking a series of questions about delegation triggers, sync/async modes, session naming, and plugin placement. The session concluded with a comprehensive, multi-section design for the new 'codex-delegate' skill, ready for implementation planning.
